segments.advisor_message: So, let’s dig into your expenses a bit. Can you tell me what some of your regular monthly expenses are? Maybe like, uh, what your biggest one is?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, so like, I guess the biggest one would be our, um, mortgage payment. It’s, uh, about one thousand five hundred bucks a month, I think. It’s essential, you know.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! A big one for sure. Is it just your name on the, uh, mortgage or do you and your spouse share it?
segments.client_message: Oh no, it’s mine. Just my name. Uh, my spouse doesn’t, like, work, so yeah.

segments.advisor_message: Alright, thanks for that info. We’ll definitely need to include that in the plan. Let’s make sure to, uh, schedule time to go over the rest of your expenses next week, okay?
segments.client_message: Sounds good! I’ll, like, gather all the other bills for that. See you next week!
